theScene: You didn't think a lot would be happening during as it was only the day shift, so you really have nothing else to do except cleaning the glasses for Belle. But as your day continues, you notice a woman you haven't seen before come in the brothel and sit at a table nearby.

As you try to get back to doing your job, you notice Vivian making a rare appearence and walking towards the woman as they both notice each other, Vivian then notions for you to come over. She then smiles at her guest.
Its not often you come here, anything I could help you with personally?
The woman casually snickers and forces a yawn receiving a somewhat annoyed look on Vivian's face.
No, I don't think you can Vivian, unless I can get some tea. Or is your breasts all you good for around here?
Vivian glares at the woman before looking towards you attempting to keep herself calm and avoid attention.
One Green Bamboo Tea for Ms. Izebel.
You go towards the back to find the ingredients for the tea she requested. As you do, Vivian then returns to her patron with a caring smile.
I'm assuming you won't be here long?
The woman gives a small sneer
Well of course, Milady Vivian, why would I ever stay in this brothel when I could find better company elsewhere?
Vivian is doing her best to keep her appearence about her despite clenching her fist. But then saddens.
Look, I know I haven't been the best of...aquantices or business partners, but I was very sorry to hear about your-
Forget it. No use dwelling on the past. Plus I have {i}plenty{/i} to live for.
You return, but turn to Vivian.
I'm sorry, but I checked the storage, it seems we no longer have any of the ingredients, I checked everywhere.
Once hearing your words, Izebel begins to stand up in slight annoyance.
A wasted trip, guess I'll see you later Vivian
She turns to leave but Vivian stops in front of her before she could get out the door
If you don't mind Izebel, while not stay for a bit and rest upstairs? I can arrange a room, besides, with your presence here, you're sure to attract more customers for me.
Izebel looks annoyed for a second at Vivian but then turns to you, then gives a devilish smug

Hmph, I really should be getting back to my shop, but I guess I can stay a while, but I refuse to be your personal attraction, and I'll need a toy to play with so I don't get bored of this place. You know what happened last time I came through this place.
Vivian notions at you and smiles, knowing instantly it was a sign of trouble.
Take him, if he doesn't give a good performance, I'll have Belle kick him out.

Aww, don't look at me that way honey, you'll break my heart, you know when my employees don't meet their expectations I have to cut my losses. Besides, you won't fail, you get more compliments than my other waiters.
Izebel relishes the thought, taking a moment to glance you over up and down, then letting out a sultry giggle.
Really now? He is kind of cute...maybe I will, unless he doesn't want to?

She makes small giggles as her breasts make small enticing bounces, and you have to admit, she has a way about her that makes your head spin, but your also wondering about [i]the last time a bear was in the bar[/i].

Vivian smiles as you glance back at her wondering what she's gotten you into
Izebel throws you with force on a bed in which you make a slight yelp creating a small giggle from Izebel as she crawls on the bed herself looking down at you.
So handsome, what will it be?
You think carefully as your not in a position to argue with her.
What would you like to do?
What would you like to do?
She looks disappointed and sits up in the bed.
She yawns and lays by you, showcasing her chest and thighes as you gather your thoughts.
What did you mean by lastime?
What did you mean by lastime?
You either must be new to the bar, or never been to Bamboo Hill. But that's where I'm from, along with others like me.
Well, can't say others are like me, but you get what I mean.
Bamboo Road is not far from here actually, its on the right side of the mountainous areas closer to the shore. Can't really miss it for its distinctive trees

If you ever followed the road there, you eventually would see a small village around the base of the Bamboo Hill, my home and shop is based on that hill. I sell things there that I've made that you can't get anywhere else
You would really do good to come by sometime, just watch out for the enemies on the way. There's Kunoichi, Harpies, Xiongmao's. There's even a rare occurence where you can run into a Bunyip
Although...watch out too, there's really terrible chance you'll run into Aruka, she'll get you in trouble in more ways than one...that dumbass monkey, I'd like to tear her to shreds.
Anyways, you'll have fun, especially if you come to visit me, just don't expect an actual date.
Izebel gives you a small glare.
I'm a Panda, don't confuse me with that word. I hate being called that. Most bears are rugged, ugly, and belong under a rock.

Us panda's have more class, we're more beautiful, and more gentle. You would do good to remember that. Of course, we may be the same species, but knowing the difference may save you a world of hurt or even save your life.
Izebel then gives you another glare
Especially when in my presence, I take things like that seriously, so unless you want to be on my blacklist, then don't.

EventText.NameOfScene: What did you mean by lastime?
